dcterms:description: A corpus for robust speech recognition, containing real and simulated noisy environments. Includes training, development, and test sets with speech data from various noisy conditions.

dcterms:description: A widely used speech corpus for training and testing speech recognition systems, containing clean speech data from the Wall Street Journal.
dcterms:title: WSJ0
